item.title: 介绍|Intro
item.description:
匿名提问箱/Anonymous question box

岛是一只看似复杂实则简单的奇妙生物 ✧ʕ̢̣̣̣̣̩̩̩̩·͡˔·ོɁ̡̣̣̣̣̩̩̩̩✧

融合人类常见的缺点（没有耐心、易燃易爆炸，普通却自信）和不太常见的优点（超强的共情能力、多愁善感，还算善良）；难以贴标签，很好相处，每天产出的废话堪比小型垃圾场（约三吨，疑似过度思考的副作用）

目前被命运安排在美洲大陆栖息（已经八年了，大概还要5-8年或者一辈子）。时刻都在幻想远走高飞，奈何理想很丰满、现实很骨感。于是乎安于现状，得过且过，看似无甚大志，却在暗地里幻想着一鸣惊人

渴望被看见和记住，渴望被接纳与认可； 向往自由，但在太自由的环境里又会无所适从。

15%好奇心 + 20%温暖 + 10%阴暗 + 20%叛逆 + 15%特立独行 + 10%懒惰 + 9%固执 = 99%の岛（当然了还有1%的神秘）

岛的接触手册/Manual

I am island - a seemingly complex yet essentially simple, wonderful creature ✧ʕ̢̣̣̣̣̩̩̩̩·͡˔·ོɁ̡̣̣̣̣̩̩̩̩✧

Blending common human flaws (impatience, easily inflammable, ordinary yet confident) and less common strengths (extremely empathetic, emotionally sensitive, somewhat kind); difficult to label, easy to get along with, producing daily nonsense comparable to a small garbage dump (about three tons, possibly a side effect of overthinking)

Currently residing on the American continent (likely for 5-8 years or a lifetime). Always fantasizing about escaping, yet recognizing the gap between ideal and reality. Thus, settling into the status quo, getting by day by day, seemingly lacking ambition, secretly dreaming of a breakthrough.

Craving to be seen and remembered, yearning for acceptance and validation Longing for freedom, yet feeling lost in an environment that’s too free.

15% curiosity + 20% warmth + 10% darkness + 20% rebellion + 15% uniqueness + 10% laziness + 9% stubbornness = 99% of an island (with 1% mystery, of course)

item.title: 朋友|Friends
item.description:
世界好大，在互联网这片无边无际的星空里，我们就像一颗颗闪闪发亮的星球，被奇妙的缘分牵引在一起。

欢迎你在无垠的宇宙中降落到我的星球做客！这里展示的是我珍贵的网络朋友们——他们每个人都有自己独特的故事和光芒，在各自的小天地里绽放异彩。

我很荣幸能为你介绍这些点亮我生命的朋友们，这里就是连接彼此的银河驿站。

愿你永远保持好奇和探索的心，在前方未知的旅途中发现无限精彩。

The world is vast! In the boundless starry sky of the internet, we’re like twinkling planets drawn together by a magical destiny. Welcome to my planet in this infinite universe! Here you’ll find my precious online friends—each with their own unique story and light, shining brilliantly in their own little worlds.

I’m honored to introduce these friends who illuminate my life, and this is our galactic station where we all connect.

May you always keep your curiosity and exploratory spirit, discovering endless wonders on your unknown journey ahead!

If you’d like to exchange friend links with me, please leave a comment below in this format: 1.Name: 2.Website: 3.Introduce yourself in one sentence:
